prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered balanced pose holding geometric scales in one hand, chibi proportions with large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth. Hair or geometric crystalline appendages incorporating Merkaba, Flower of Life, Vesica Piscis patterns from sacred geometry symbolism. Outfit is unique: neutral grey and neutral grey angular armor-like robes with flame geometric patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for heat and energy, elaborate with prismatic Fire element triangular motifs and ascending patterns and Intersecting Merkaba emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like rose of victory with seven-fold geometric petals with quantum spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like flickering flame wisps and ember particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor VOANAMB's profile: 'He to whom truth is relative', Aethyr VTA, Fire element, Tarot Justice, Sephirot Netzach, Zodiac Libra, embodying the essence: 'In VOANAMB's presence, truth shifts with perspective every context and season refracts reality into ...' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

profile_data.title: 'He to whom truth is relative'
profile_data.essence: In VOANAMB's presence, truth shifts with perspective every context and season refracts reality into a different hue of understanding.
profile_data.angelic_role: Power of Prismatic Truth; commands sunsworn warriors.
profile_data.form_description: A prismatic human-like figure composed of interlocking geometric fire crystals, representing the fractal nature of truth and perception. The form shifts between solid and translucent states, embodying the fluid nature of understanding.
profile_data.color_reasoning: Amber-gold represents the fire element's transformative power, while crimson symbolizes the passionate pursuit of truth. The prismatic nature reflects the Aethyr VTA's quality of refracting perception.
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Sacred geometries represent the interconnected nature of truth, with constant subtle transformations indicating the dynamic nature of perception
